definition: gold/chemical element Au/generic term for lustrous and ductile metals/money/golden/highly respected/one of the eight categories of ancient musical instruments 八音[ba1 yin1]
Myrtaceae (family including myrtle, rosemary, oregano etc)

sentences.english: Myrtle haunts a girls' bathroom on the second floor.
sentences.chinese: 桃金娘經常出沒在二樓的一間女盥洗室。

sentences.english: Nor plant I it from rose- or Myrtle-tree.
sentences.chinese: 插滿玫瑰和桃金娘，卻讓它披垂。

sentences.english: They give as in yonder valley the myrtle breathes its fragrance into space.
sentences.chinese: 他們施與，就像山谷那邊的桃金娘散發芳香。

sentences.english: The white flowers in the myrtle smell sweet.
sentences.chinese: 桃金娘上的白花聞起來很香。

sentences.english: The myrtle, dove, sparrow, and swan are sacred to her.
sentences.chinese: 桃金娘，鴿子，麻雀和天鵝是她的聖物。

definition: Myrtaceae (family including myrtle, rosemary, oregano etc)
Ericaceae (botany), genus containing rhododendron and azalea
Labiatae, the taxonomic family including lavender, mint
balsam/Balsaminaceae (a flower family including Impatiens balsamina)/touch-me-not/busy Lizzie
